author: chron.com
title: Art galleries: Oct. 15-21
text:
Galleries
John Adelman : "Further," through Saturday; Nicole Longnecker Gallery , 2625 Colquitt; 713-591-4997, longneckergallery.com .
Ask Forgiveness: Installation by Nick Barbee , through Oct. 24; GalleryHomeland, 2327 Commerce, No. 108; companion show "Good Riddance," through Oct. 28; HomeCore, 2010 Commerce, Unit B; 503-819-9656, galleryhomeland.org .
The Bridge Club Collaborative : "Cut," through Oct. 24; Art Palace, 3913 Main; 832-390-1273, artpalacegallery.com .
Sandi Seltzer Bryant : "New Works," and "Troy Dugas: New Works," through Saturday; McMurtrey Gallery , 3508 Lake; 713-523-8238, mcmurtreygallery.com .
Mark Fox: "Giverny: Journal of an Unseen Garden," video installation, through Nov. 28; Hiram Butler Gallery, 4520 Blossom; 713-863-7097, hirambutler.com .
Judy Ledgerwood : "Refrain," opens 6:30 p.m. Thursday, through Nov. 14; Barbara Davis Gallery , 4411 Montrose, 713-520-9200, barbaradavisgallery.com .
Margaret Meehan : "Every Witch Way but Loose," opens 6 p.m. Friday, through Nov. 14; David Shelton Gallery , 3909 Main; 832-538-0924, davidsheltongallery.com .
Heavy Metal: Sculptural works by John Clement and Mac Whitney; through Oct. 31; Gallery Sonja Roesch , 2309 Caroline; 713-659-5424, gallerysonjaroesch.com .
Bo Joseph: "Souvenirs From Nowhere," through Oct. 22; McClain Gallery , 2242 Richmond; 713-520-9988, mcclaingallery.com .
Laura Lark : "The Misuses of Enchantment," through Oct. 24; Devin Borden Gallery, 3917 Main; 713-529-2700, devinborden.com .
Mary McCleary : "Voyage," through Saturday; Moody Gallery, 2815 Colquitt; 713-526-9911, moodygallery.com .
Kelly Moran : "Only Human," through Saturday; d.m. allison gallery, 2709 Colquitt; 832-607-4378, dma-art.com .
Demetrius Oliver : "Anemometer," through Oct. 24; Inman Gallery , 3901 Main; 713-526-7800, inmangallery.com .
Quartets: Solo show by Tony Magar ; through Saturday; Laura Rathe Fine Art, 2707 Colquitt; 713-527-7700, laurathe.com .
Jacqueline Dee Parker : "Pole Dancing on the Axis Mundi" and "Ward Sanders: Howling Fantods: A Tribute to David Foster Wallace ," through Saturday; Hooks-Epstein Galleries, 2631 Colquitt; 713-522-0718, hooksepsteingalleries.com .
Susan Plum : "Soul Retrieval," through Oct. 31; Deborah Colton Gallery , 2445 North; 713-869-5151, deboracoltongallery.com .
Miguel Angel Rios : "Endless," through Nov. 21; Sicardi Gallery , 1506 W. Alabama; 713-529-01313, sicardigallery.com .
Luz María Sánchez and Maja Ruzni: "Ya no llevó el Nahual/Babaroga je dosla (because the boogeyman is here)," through Nov. 7; She Works Flexible, 1709 Westheimer; 713-522-0639, sheworksflexible.com .
Katia Santibanez : "New Paintings," through Saturday; Texas Gallery , 2012 Peden; 713-524-1593, texgal.com .
David Scheinbaum : "Kalós," through Saturday; Catherine Couturier Gallery , 2635 Colquitt; 713-524-5070, catherinecouturier.com .
The Comptons of Texas: Rediscovered Works of Carl Benton and Mildred Norris Compton , through Oct. 24; William Reaves Fine Art, 2143 Westheimer; 713-521-7500, reavesart.com .
Tim Schneider : Landscape paintings, through Nov. 15; DesignWorks, 2119A Postoffice, Galveston; 409-766-7599.
Some Assembly Required : Collaborative sculpture by Dylan Conner , Alex Larsen and Patrick Renner , through Nov. 4; G Gallery, 301 E. 11th St.; 713-822-4842, ggalleryhouston.com .
Songs of Lao: Photographs by Kenro Izu and Yumiko Izu, through Oct. 24; Booker- Lowe Gallery , 5623 Feagan; 713-880-1541, bookerlowegallery.com .
Stories in Steel: Works by sculptor Ed Wilson , through Nov. 19; Heritage Plaza Lobby, 1111 Bagby; artsbrookfield.com .
University of Houston -Downtown Faculty Exhibition: Works by Mark Cervenka , John Davis , Gaby Hernandez , El Franco Lee II, Floyd Newsum , Mason Rankin , Beth Secor and Kaneem Smith, through Dec. 5; O'Kane Gallery , University of Houston Downtown, One Main; 713-221-8042, uhd.edu .
